dmca.title: German regulatory body reported illegal material
dmca.body:
A URL that otherwise would have appeared in response to your search,
was not displayed because that URL was reported as illegal by a German
regulatory body.


Ihre Suche h?tte in den Suchergebnissen einen Treffer generiert, den
wir Ihnen nicht anzeigen, da uns von einer zust?ndigen Stelle in
Deutschland mitgeteilt wurde, dass die entsprechende URL unrechtm??ig
ist.



I don't understand why http://www.pornaccess.com was removed from google.de

Can you say me why the website is illegal?

We have the "18 U.S.C. 2257 Record-Keeping Requirements Compliance Statement" on footer to prove that all models, actors, actresses and other persons that appear in any visual depiction of actual or simulated sexual conduct appearing or otherwise contained in all Pornaccess websites were over the age of eighteen (18) years at the time of the creation of such depictions.

Thanks
